title: Shakira discography
summary: Colombian singer and songwriter Shakira has released 11 studio albums, five live albums, two compilation albums, 68 singles (including 13 as a featured artist and 5 promotional singles) and 62 music videos (see Shakira videography). With estimated sales of 80 million albums worldwide as of 2014 according to Billboard, she is the highest-selling Colombian artist and the best-selling female Latin artist of all time.[1][2] She is the only South American artist to peak at number one on the Australian Singles Chart, the UK Singles Chart, and the US Billboard Hot 100.[3] Her singles "Hips Don't Lie" and "Waka Waka (This Time for Africa)", have achieved sales in excess of five million units, becoming some of the best-selling singles worldwide.[4][5]
